Ingredients.4: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 tablespoon minced green onion, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler. Lightly grease a broiler pan or baking sheet.

Directions.2: Shred crabmeat and place in a medium bowl with bread crumbs and parsley. Mix together and season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Whisk egg, mayonnaise, green onion, dry mustard, and hot pepper sauce together in a small bowl. Add to crabmeat mixture and mix well. Form into 6 patties and place on the prepared pan. Brush tops with melted butter.

Directions.4: Cook under the preheated broiler until lightly browned and cooked through, 10 to 15 minutes.
